summary: This document is an email exchange between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley discussing a follow-up on previous communications. The email indicates a connection to securities and includes a confidentiality disclaimer.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing follow-up communications with Jes Staley.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email, inquiring about a connection with someone named Starr.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley are engaged in a personal email exchange discussing follow-up communications.

keyFacts: The email was sent on February 9, 2011.
Jeffrey Epstein expresses apologies for typos in the email.
Jes Staley inquires about a connection with someone named Starr.
The email includes a confidentiality disclaimer related to securities.
The email was sent from Epstein's iPhone.
